Kana: あした、あす、みょうにち
センチメートル、センチ

English: to return, to come home, to go home
to return, to come back, to go back
to raise or extend one's hands
to become confused, to be disturbed
to get chilly, to grow cold, to cool down
to become sober, to wake, to be disillusioned
to solidify, to become firm, to harden
to be surrounded, to overflow, to be filled
to be covered, to be buried
to celebrate, to have delight, to have joy
to console, to consolate, to provide empathy
to be disinterested, to be bored, to be tired of
to be astonished, to be surprised, to be scared
to exchange, to substitute, to replace
to rest, to take a break, to go to bed
to split into, to be divided
to part, to separate, to break up

Kanji: and then, and, thus, and now

Romaji: e (へ is read as e when a particle)
things like..., including, such things as
te form of verb or adjective [see explanation]

English: is trying to recall some information
